paper_abstract: A tree-like substructure on a computer chip whose task is to carry a signal from a source circuit to possibly many sink circuits and which consists only of wires and so-called repeater circuits is called a repeater tree. We present a mathematical formulation of the optimization problems related to the construction of such repeater trees. Furthermore, we prove theoretical properties of a simple iterative procedure for these problems which was successfully applied in practice. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
